comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Kuburat3 on July 24, 2023, 04:36:13 AMWill you keep buying the drugs or have your way with your little Girlfriend??You should be ashamed of yourself!Someone your age should be more interested in ways to make your life better by focusing on things that matter to your future than just thinking of sex with a minor.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: OP it's obvious that not only were you a newbie but a trolling clawn indeed, you break two rules with this your useless post, first wrong you did was to come to economics board to discuss about relationships that is less of anyone's business here but something which is meant to be personal to you, if you think your libido is extremely high, then consult your doctor for that, secondly, this whole discussion is more of off topic to be because I don't even see where it could belong if moved by the moderator than to lock or delete it, is this your own definition of how to make a quality post?

comments.author: KiaKia
comments.body: That gut that you have to bring this on this forum, man, wonders shall never end.At your age I was struggling to learn a good skill for my future since I don't plan on furthering my education, but my mind was set on making money and not females, they are trouble and I stay away from them to avoid distraction. You are the first person that I really feel disappointed for, I wonder what your goals in life is, at this very young age all you could think about is this? You are a complete failure boy. Have your way with your little girl friend and see what happens next, mistakes that most grown up regretted is what you want to start your life with, good luck.
